title: applications passwords
content: my phone does not always prompt me to save when logging into an app or web page.  since i use firefox instead of chrome, i assume that's the problem with the web pages.  but my bigger frustration is applications.  the autofill settings are set to "on."  but, for instance, for the lowes app, it offered to save the login, and now it autofills like it should when i open the lowes app.  but for AT&T, the i was never prompted to save the login, so i have to input it manually every time.  there are others, and i don't understand the inconsistency.  am i missing something?
